attributes.description:
This FJ is in very good condition with lots of extras and spare key. Very sought after vehicle and kitted out by LA Sport(TJM Equipped). Partial service history noted in booklet but judging by the condition it surely had been serviced regularly. Very capable vehicle off road with lot's of ground clearance and incline/departure angles. Perfect for the 4x4 enthusiast or camper. Comes with E/Windows, E/Mirrors, P/Steering, A/C, Cruise Control, Multi-function steering wheel, Factory fitted Radio/CD Player with Bluetooth/USB/AUX ports, Rear Diff-Lock and Rear camera/PDC ready. Extras fitted:

TJM 9500 winch and controller.
TJM front bumper.
TJM rear bumper with 2 x Jerry cans and holders.
5 x XD Series mag wheels.
285/70/17 Mud Terrain tyres.
TJM XGS Gold series lift suspension.
Smash Grab window film.
Blackout doors and bonnet vinyl(bonnet to be done).
MAXI Spotlights.
Fender Flares.

Finance available. Please contact me for application or for viewing.

All vehicles sold with 1 month/1500kms warranty OR 2 year mechanical breakdown warranty as optional.

All trade-ins welcome. 

Theos Bakkie Sales.
73 Van Riebeeck Road.
Kuilsriver.
Cape Town.

Toyota FJ Cruiser 4.0 V6 4x4 AT.

Power -  200 kW @ 5600 rpm.
Torque -  380 Nm @ 4000 rpm.
Economy - 11.9 l/100km.
Emissions Rating - EU3.
Gears - 5 / ALL.
Acceleration - 7.6 seconds.
Top Speed - 175 km/h.
Airbags (total) - 6.
Length - 4,670 mm.
Seats - 5.
Fuel Tank Capacity - 72 litres.
Boot Capacity - 990 litres.
Service Intervals - 10,000 km.
